input.sentences: the costume party was off to a great start .
not everyone was there for the costumes though ...
there was some amazing face paint there .
as well as an amazing plummer costume .
everyone had a great time that night .
output.sentences: The party was beginning to start and people were arriving in droves in costume!
The costumes were amazing and so much variety could be found!
Take this Shrek cosplay for example and note just how amazing that paint job was done!
Oh, and let's not forget our favorite Italian plumber that someone adorned themselves in equally as amazing fashion for this years' costume contest.
It's just that time of night that things will get crazy, things will get wild, and whatever happens at the costume party stays at the costume party.
